name: Prototype Malice
r1: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4 Energy every 2s for 6s. Additionally, all party members will regenerate 4% HP every 2s for this duration.
r2: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4.5 Energy every 2s for 6s. Additionally, all party members will regenerate 4.5% HP every 2s for this duration.
r3: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 5 Energy every 2s for 6s. Additionally, all party members will regenerate 5% HP every 2s for this duration.
r4: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 5.5 Energy every 2s for 6s. Additionally, all party members will regenerate 5.5% HP every 2s for this duration.
r5: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 6 Energy every 2s for 6s. Additionally, all party members will regenerate 6% HP every 2s for this duration.
